key.description: The key token in JSON format. Use this value as a bearer token to authenticate HTTP requests to the workspace.

keyName.description: Specifies the name of the API key. Key names must be unique to the workspace.

keyRole.description: Specifies the permission level of the API key. Valid values are `VIEWER`, `EDITOR`, or `ADMIN`.

secondsToLive.description: Specifies the time in seconds until the API key expires. Keys can be valid for up to 30 days.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace that the API key is valid for.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering WorkspaceApiKey resources.
